title: Energy use: renewable and waste sources
publisher: International trade in services by subnational areas of the UK: 2018
description: The UK's energy use from renewable and waste sources, by source (for example, hydroelectric power, wind, wave, solar, and so on) and industry (SIC 2007 section - 21 categories), 1990 to 2019.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to latest version.
sizingNotes: Simple table structure and dimensions with some footnotes.
notes: Priority dataset for Climate Change Platform project.
